techmeme.title: Amazon unveils Amazon Grocery, a new private-label brand that offers 1,000+ grocery items largely priced below $5, available online and at Amazon Fresh stores (Robin Ajello/Bloomberg)
Amazon unveils updates to Luna, including adding AAA games like Hogwarts Legacy and new GameNight original party games, available to Prime subscribers (Jennifer Maas/Variety)
Google Home Speaker hands-on: the new $99 speaker is a similar size to the HomePod mini, comes in four colors, and Gemini is a vastly improved assistant (Jennifer Pattison Tuohy/The Verge)
Google unveils new Home products: $99 Google Home Speaker, set for spring 2026, third-gen $100 Nest Cam Indoor, second-gen $150 Nest Cam Outdoor, and more (Chris Welch/Bloomberg)
Meta plans to start using users' AI chatbot conversations to help personalize ads and content, starting December 16, but not in the UK, South Korea, and the EU (Meghan Bobrowsky/Wall Street Journal)
